word_mean: 气喘，哮喘：一种阵发性呼吸困难反复发作的状态，伴有由于支气管痉挛性收缩引起的喘鸣。有些气喘病例是过敏性患者的变应性表现(支气管变应性)，另一些病例则由许多因素激发，包括剧烈运动、刺激性尘埃、心理紧张等
又称“哮喘”。以发作性喉中哮鸣有声，呼吸困难，甚则喘息不得平卧为主要表现的疾病。

sentence.Network_en: Allergy to cats is one of the commonest causes of asthma.
sentence.Network_cn: 对猫类过敏是哮喘病发作最常见的诱因之一。

sentence.Network_en: Frequently sufferers of this kind of allergy are also sufferers of asthma.
sentence.Network_cn: 患有这种过敏症的人也经常会患有哮喘病。

sentence.Network_en: Most people do not have to be hospitalized for asthma or pneumonia.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数哮喘或肺炎患者无需住院。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from medieval Latin asma, from Greek asthma, from azein 'breathe hard'

entry.def: Asthma is a lung condition which causes difficulty in breathing.

means.word_mean: 1. respiratory disorder characterized by wheezing; usually of allergic origin

sentences.en: I think he's having an asthma attack.
sentences.cn: 我想他现在是哮喘病发作了。

jushi.english: “Auntie told me not to run,” he explained,“on account of my asthma.”
jushi.chinese: “阿姨叫我不要跑,”他解释道,“因为我有气喘病。”
